item.title: CVE-2021-24479|2024-08-03T19:35:19.406Z -- unknown -- drawblog
item.description: The DrawBlog WordPress plugin through 0.90 does not sanitise or validate some of its settings before outputting them back in the page, leading to an authenticated stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
